about.label: Why Choose Us
about.title: Your Car Deserves the Best Care
about.paragraph1: Oficina Rodrigues has been the trusted name in auto repair in Carcavelos for over 17 years. Founded by António Rodrigues, a factory-trained mechanic with 30+ years of experience, our family-run shop treats every car — and every customer — like our own.
about.paragraph2: We specialize in all major European brands: BMW, Mercedes, Audi, Volkswagen, Renault, Peugeot, and more. From routine oil changes to complex engine diagnostics, we use genuine parts and the latest diagnostic equipment to get it right the first time.
about.paragraph3: No hidden fees, no unnecessary repairs. We always explain the problem, show you what needs fixing, and give you a clear quote before any work begins. That's the Rodrigues promise.
